title: New: Vaults – Premonitions
content:
Vaults caused quite a stir last year with their stunning debut outing, Cry No More, an emotionally fraught, electro-pop beauty, showcasing a real depth of sound, as well as the potential to be real chart-worries.

As well as announcing details of their debut live show (15 May, The Courtyard Theatre, London – sold out already, sorry!), the trio are set to release their debut single proper through National Anthem on 9 June. Premonitions is delicately poised, yet hard-hitting, owing as much to recent success story London Grammar as it does to Björk. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
